forumNotes.author: Tokener
forumNotes.content:
![Posted Image](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&module=display§ion=screenshot&id=282) **File Name** : PE Links **File Submitter** : [ReTokener](http://reboot.pro/index.php?showuser=21675 "") **File Submitted** : 02 Mar 2013 **File Updated** : *04 May 2021* **File Category** : [Boot tools](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&showcat=7 "") PE-Links is a tool to provide links in a PE environment. You can create links in PE-Desktop, Startmenu, SendTo, Links and Administrative Tools. Once your Custom PE-Root-Directory is chosen you can easily access "Program Files", "Program Files (x86)", "Windows", "Start Menu" etc. New version supports BBLean-shell, used in MistyPE. The program will remember chosen PE-Root-directories. The password for the archive is: **PE-Links** Enjoy customizing your PE. Regards T.









Wurzel [Click here to download this file](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&showfile=282 "")
